channel.title: Making my server both pking and regular. plz help!
channel.description:
hey guys i have a pking server and well i want to make varrock a pking server and al-karad a regular server. I would take al-karad and make it non-wildy. so I need alot of help from you coders out there. so what i was thinking was that i make fishing, mining/smithing, crafting, and runecrafting a skill to use on pimpscape source. right now smithing kinda works but i want elemental bars and gold bars to work.
In crafting i think i know how to make a code that when you use a chisel with a uncut (gem) and then it deletes that uncut (gem) and then it adds a (gem) and then gives you like 1000 xp for crafting. Also i want to do that with d hide.
I still need help with crafting.
and i need alot of help with mining cause i have no clue how to do that.
I also (also) want to get fishing and cooking.
can anyone of you coders help? plz? you can msn messenger me or get on my server :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: Making my server both pking and regular. plz help!
item.dc:creator: @sitebanis sitebanis
item.description:
@sitebanis wrote:

but it will be the same server? i want it so that instead of 2 servers i want 1 server so that that 1 server is a pking server and a reg server.

Read full topic
item.source: Making my server both pking and regular. plz help!

item.title: Making my server both pking and regular. plz help!
item.dc:creator: @IP1 IP
item.description:
@IP1 wrote:

There are two things you could do.

  1. Download the source again, make a copy, and change the port to ONE of them ( so maybe one would be 43594 for pking and 5555 for regular)
  2. Make al kharid a safezone, and add some global objects

let me get you the links for the adding global objects tutorial and safezone tutorial

Adding Global Objects
Making Safezones

Read full topic
item.source: Making my server both pking and regular. plz help!
